name: Bermuda's Dota 2 CFG
short_description:
Wordpress Post : http://imnotbermuda.com/2014/02/10/bermudas-dota-2-cfg/

Using CFG is a feature of any Source Engine games including Dota 2.

Dota 2 CFG by Bermuda will provide users, both new and experienced, more convenient and quick ways to achieve tasks in game.

You can quickly turn your camera to check both runes and get back to your character, note your allies about Roshan timing, call the hasted courier in a click of a button and much more. 

Performance Tweaks are also major part of the CFG. Many users have already experienced minor to major fps boosts using this CFG. You can always tweak to your will.
summary: Tweaked Dota 2 CFG for everyone's convenience.
